attributes.action: The AI Immigrant - Steer our collective human future to avoid mass replacement.
attributes.additional_details:
I am concerned of the destabilising impact mass unemployment has on a society. AI driverless cars could be the start of replacing all drivers, AI legal advisors replace graduate entry law jobs etc, AI lawmakers could debate and replace politicians.

Make AI a tier 1 political issue that is discussed at length. 

This might be our last chance to use democracy to regulate the AI companies before a handful of individuals decided for the rest of us.
attributes.background: Please discuss at length the impact that artificial intelligence will take peoples jobs and what steps we can take to steer the future of the UK to a positive outcome for people.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about AI, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may wish to sign the following:

Review and Regulate AI to Protect Jobs and Prevent Mass Unemployment
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/753437 

Mandate AI job impact assessments and transition support for UK workers
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/731495
